```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(plotly)
titanic <- read.csv("titanic.csv") %>% 
  mutate(Survival = if_else(Survived == 0, "Died", "Survived"))
```

## Titanic Slide


```{r plot, echo = TRUE}
plot_ly(titanic, x=~Pclass, y=~Survived, color=~Sex, type="bar")
```
